resources.string: "create table %1$s ( %2$s string primary key, %3$s string, %4$s integer, %5$s integer not null default (strftime('%%s','now')) );"
"%1$s like ? || '%%' and (%2$s is null or cast(strftime('%%s','now') as integer) < %2$s + %3$s)"
"%1$s is not null and cast(strftime('%%s','now') as integer) > %1$s + %2$s"
